titles.title: Federal None of the Above Act of 2001
To permit voters to vote for "None of the Above" in elections for Federal office and to require an additional election if "None of the Above" receives the most votes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 8/2/2001--Introduced. Federal None of the Above Act of 2001 - Requires in each election for Federal office for there to be included on the ballot after the names of all candidates a separate line for "None of the Above." Requires a new election if "None of the Above" receives the most votes.
